attributes.action: Increase senior citizen winter heating allowance in line with annual price rises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Senior citizens pensions (benefit) is increased slightly each year, (percentage wise). Where as council tax is raised substantially each year,(percentage wise), as well as the water rate.  Gas, and electricity prices are raised ad-hoc, (percentage wise), as seen this past year with more threatened rises this year. AND more to come, no doubt. This annual dwindling of this allowance, may subject the senior citizen population of this country to ill health,or even death,which in turn puts more burden and costs to the NHS. Mr Prime Minister, since we have had the £200 Winter Heating Allowance, to quote the phrase, what is it now worth " IN REAL TERMS" ?
